stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One VANGUARD INVADER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, your unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18" or, if your unit has the Lone Operative ability, if the attacking model is within 6". Your opponent can select new targets for the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One VANGUARD INVADER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18" or, if your unit has the Lone Operative ability, if the attacking model is within 6". Your opponent can select new targets for the attacking unit’s attacks.

stratagems.name: INVISIBLE HUNTER
stratagems.legend: Hunter-slayer organisms can melt away before the eyes of their foes, only to strike from a new direction.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.TARGET: Up to two VANGUARD INVADER units from your army, or one TYRANIDS INFANTRY unit from your army.EFFECT: Remove the targeted units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.RESTRICTIONS: The targeted units must be more than 3" away from all enemy units.
stratagems.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
stratagems.target: Up to two VANGUARD INVADER units from your army, or one TYRANIDS INFANTRY unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Remove the targeted units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.RESTRICTIONS: The targeted units must be more than 3" away from all enemy units.

stratagems.name: PARASITIC PAYLOAD
stratagems.type: Warrior Bioform Onslaught – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The projectiles fired by this weapon are infected with parasites that burrow into the central nervous systems of their targets, causing them to wail and scream in pain and giving away their position to the oncoming swarms.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One TYRANID WARRIORS WITH RANGED BIO-WEAPONS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability. After your unit has resolved its shooting attacks this phase, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the turn, models in that unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One TYRANID WARRIORS WITH RANGED BIO-WEAPONS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability. After your unit has resolved its shooting attacks this phase, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the turn, models in that unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover.

stratagems.name: SYNAPTIC MICRONODES
stratagems.type: Warrior Bioform Onslaught – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Impulses from the Hive Mind compel its most adaptable bioforms to shed microbial micronodes that burrow into the soil, knitting together to form a short-term synaptic relay that persists only as long as the brief-burning lifespans of its composite creatures.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One TYRANID WARRIORS unit from your army.EFFECT: Select one objective marker you control that your unit is within range of. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One TYRANID WARRIORS unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Select one objective marker you control that your unit is within range of. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

stratagems.name: RESTORATIVE IMPULSE
stratagems.type: Warrior Bioform Onslaught – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Responding to impulses from the Hive Mind, dormant nanoviral organisms awaken within the corpse of a fallen Tyranid Warrior, knitting together ruptured organs and restoring its broken form to life.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Command phase.TARGET: One TYRANID WARRIORS unit from your army that is below its Starting Strength.EFFECT: Return 1 destroyed model (excluding CHARACTER models) to your unit.
stratagems.when: Your Command phase.
stratagems.target: One TYRANID WARRIORS unit from your army that is below its Starting Strength.
stratagems.effect: Return 1 destroyed model (excluding CHARACTER models) to your unit.

stratagems.name: SYNAPTIC AMPLIFICATION
stratagems.type: Warrior Bioform Onslaught – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Tyranid Warriors focus and amplify the urgency of the Hive Mind’s impulse to nearby broods, lending them increased coordination.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.TARGET: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.EFFECT: If that unit is a TYRANID WARRIORS unit, select up to one ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army, that is not Battle-shocked, within 6" of it. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in those units makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1, and, if it is a TYRANID WARRIORS unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 as well.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: If that unit is a TYRANID WARRIORS unit, select up to one ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army, that is not Battle-shocked, within 6" of it. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in those units makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1, and, if it is a TYRANID WARRIORS unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 as well.

stratagems.name: SYNAPTIC SHIELD
stratagems.type: Warrior Bioform Onslaught – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: By focusing the psionic energies of the Hive Mind, these leader‑beasts shield the teeming bioforms under their command.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One TYRANID WARRIORS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: If that unit is a TYRANID WARRIORS unit, select up to one ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army, that is not Battle-shocked, within 6" of it. Until the end of the phase, each time a ranged attack targets one of those units, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of that unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One TYRANID WARRIORS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: If that unit is a TYRANID WARRIORS unit, select up to one ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army, that is not Battle-shocked, within 6" of it. Until the end of the phase, each time a ranged attack targets one of those units, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of that unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: SPONTANEOUS HYPERCORROSION
stratagems.legend: Biomorphic symbiotes growing beneath the chitinous plates of some Tyranids can be activated by synaptic impulse, acidifying their bio‑weapons at a moment’s notice.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.TARGET: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Strength characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit and add 1 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by TYRANID WARRIORS and WINGED TYRANID PRIME models in your unit.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Strength characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit and add 1 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by TYRANID WARRIORS and WINGED TYRANID PRIME models in your unit.

stratagems.name: RAPACIOUS HUNGER
stratagems.legend: The hunger of the Tyranids can never be satiated.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Fight phase.TARGET: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that just destroyed an enemy unit.EFFECT: Your unit immediately Regenerates (See Feed the Swarm). When doing so, if your unit is a HARVESTER unit and you choose for one model to regain up to D3 lost wounds, that model regains up to 3 lost wounds instead.
stratagems.when: Your Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that just destroyed an enemy unit.
stratagems.effect: Your unit immediately Regenerates (See Feed the Swarm). When doing so, if your unit is a HARVESTER unit and you choose for one model to regain up to D3 lost wounds, that model regains up to 3 lost wounds instead.

stratagems.name: BROODGUARD IMPULSE
stratagems.legend: Should a foe successfully slay one of the swarm’s assimilation organisms, they only mark themselves as a priority for predation and consumption in turn.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Any phase.TARGET: One HARVESTER unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.EFFECT: Until the end of the battle, each time a friendly TYRANIDS model makes an attack that targets the enemy unit that just destroyed your HARVESTER unit, add 1 to the Wound roll.
stratagems.when: Any phase.
stratagems.target: One HARVESTER unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the battle, each time a friendly TYRANIDS model makes an attack that targets the enemy unit that just destroyed your HARVESTER unit, add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: ABLATIVE CARAPACE
stratagems.legend: These organisms have employed consumed minerals to exude an additional hardened protective layer over their chitinous armour.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One HARVESTER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability. If your unit is within range of an objective marker you control, until the end of the phase models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability instead.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One HARVESTER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability. If your unit is within range of an objective marker you control, until the end of the phase models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability instead.

stratagems.name: TYRANNOFORMED
stratagems.legend: Swarms of diminutive Tyranid phage organisms carpet even the most vital strategic assets, steadily breaking them down for assimilation.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Command phase.TARGET: One HARVESTER unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker you control.EFFECT: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.
stratagems.when: Command phase.
stratagems.target: One HARVESTER unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker you control.
stratagems.effect: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

stratagems.name: RECLAIM BIOMASS
stratagems.legend: Dead Tyranids are consumed and reconstituted by the swarm just as readily as the lifeless carcasses of their prey.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Any phase, when a TYRANIDS unit from your army is destroyed, before the last model in it is removed from play.TARGET: One HARVESTER unit from your army that is within 6" of that destroyed unit.EFFECT: Regenerate one friendly TYRANIDS unit within 6" of your HARVESTER unit (See Feed the Swarm).
stratagems.when: Any phase, when a TYRANIDS unit from your army is destroyed, before the last model in it is removed from play.
stratagems.target: One HARVESTER unit from your army that is within 6" of that destroyed unit.
stratagems.effect: Regenerate one friendly TYRANIDS unit within 6" of your HARVESTER unit (See Feed the Swarm).

stratagems.name: SECURE BIOMASS
stratagems.legend: When rich sources of biomass are identified the warrior organisms of this swarm will stop at nothing to destroy resistance and claim them.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase.TARGET: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability. If your unit is a HARVESTER unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit as well.
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability. If your unit is a HARVESTER unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit as well.

abilities.name: Feed the Swarm
abilities.legend: Even as the beasts of the Assimilation Swarm stalk across the battlefield they make use of the abundant biomass yielded up by the prey worlds slow demise. Warrior organisms heal even the most grievous wounds in moments, or stagger upright and return to the fight after they seemed slain. A strain of revolting vitality flows through the Tyranid broods as though leeched direct from their dismayed victims.
abilities.rawDescription: In your Command phase, each HARVESTER unit from your army can Regenerate one friendly TYRANIDS unit that is within 6" of it. A unit can only be regenerated once per phase. Each time a unit regenerates, do one of the following:One model in that unit regains up to D3+1 lost wounds.One destroyed INFANTRY model (excluding CHARACTERS) is returned to that unit with its full wounds remaining. If that unit is an ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit, up to 3 destroyed models are returned instead.
abilities.formattedDescription: In your Command phase, each HARVESTER unit from your army can Regenerate one friendly TYRANIDS unit that is within 6" of it. A unit can only be regenerated once per phase. Each time a unit regenerates, do one of the following:One model in that unit regains up to D3+1 lost wounds.One destroyed INFANTRY model (excluding CHARACTERS) is returned to that unit with its full wounds remaining. If that unit is an ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit, up to 3 destroyed models are returned instead.

stratagems.name: SWARM HUNTERS
stratagems.legend: These Termagants act like a single, many-limbed, many-weaponed organism, squirming around one another to level the most firepower possible.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One TERMAGANTS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit can ignore other models in their unit for the purposes of determining visibility. In addition, if your unit is within Synapse Range of your army, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One TERMAGANTS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit can ignore other models in their unit for the purposes of determining visibility. In addition, if your unit is within Synapse Range of your army, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: ONRUSHING HORDE
stratagems.legend: Surging toward their victims in a swift mass of screeching maws and lashing talons, the Tyranids are a panic-inducing sight.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One TYRANIDS unit from your army (excluding WINGED TYRANID PRIME units), that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army (excluding WINGED TYRANID PRIME units), that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: LIVING AVALANCHE
stratagems.legend: This hatchway does not so much slide open as burst asunder like a breached dam, warrior organisms spilling forth from it in a heaving mass.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase, just after a TYRANIDS unit from your army has opened a Hatchway.TARGET: That TYRANIDS unit.EFFECT: Your unit can make a Swarm move. To do so, your unit can be moved up to 3", but at least one model from your unit must end that move on the opposite side of that Hatchway from the one it started the phase on. When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of enemy units.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, just after a TYRANIDS unit from your army has opened a Hatchway.
stratagems.target: That TYRANIDS unit.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can make a Swarm move. To do so, your unit can be moved up to 3", but at least one model from your unit must end that move on the opposite side of that Hatchway from the one it started the phase on. When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of enemy units.

stratagems.name: SQUIRMING MASSES
stratagems.legend: Like water flowing through every available gap and channel, the Tyranids squeeze through ducts and vents to spill out in the midst of the prey.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase, at the start of the Reinforcements step.TARGET: One ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army that is in Reserves.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Deep Strike ability and, when setting them upon the battlefield using that ability, they can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units, provided they are also within Synapse Range of your army.RESTRICTIONS: You can only use this Stratagem once and, until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, at the start of the Reinforcements step.
stratagems.target: One ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army that is in Reserves.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Deep Strike ability and, when setting them upon the battlefield using that ability, they can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units, provided they are also within Synapse Range of your army.RESTRICTIONS: You can only use this Stratagem once and, until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

abilities.name: Unstoppable Swarm
abilities.legend: This massed swarm of warrior organisms spills over and around one another as they advance, chitinous killers packing corridors floor to ceiling and bursting open hatchways with sheer weight of numbers.
abilities.rawDescription: Each time a TYRANIDS unit from your army moves, models in that unit can move through friendly TYRANIDS models as if they were not there. In addition, each time a TYRANIDS unit from your army attempts to operate a closed Hatchway, if your opponent tries to prevent it, add 1 to your result of the roll-off.
abilities.formattedDescription: Each time a TYRANIDS unit from your army moves, models in that unit can move through friendly TYRANIDS models as if they were not there. In addition, each time a TYRANIDS unit from your army attempts to operate a closed Hatchway, if your opponent tries to prevent it, add 1 to your result of the roll-off.

stratagems.name: LITHE KILLERS
stratagems.legend: These warrior organisms employ agility and stealth in place of resilience, weaving around their victims' blows and exploiting the tangled internal structures of the voidship to their advantage.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 5+ invulnerable save.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 5+ invulnerable save.

stratagems.name: ADRENALISED SLAUGHTER
stratagems.legend: These organisms contain additional adrenal biomorphs, which send them into a final killing frenzy just before death.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6. On a 5+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6. On a 5+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.name: TALON-TIP SWARM
stratagems.legend: As they break the prey's lines, these organisms seek key strategic sites to tear apart.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after a TYRANIDS unit from your army destroys an enemy unit.TARGET: That TYRANIDS unit.EFFECT: If your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 3". After that move, if your unit is within range of an objective marker and no enemy units are within range of that objective marker, that objective marker is Secured by your army.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after a TYRANIDS unit from your army destroys an enemy unit.
stratagems.target: That TYRANIDS unit.
stratagems.effect: If your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 3". After that move, if your unit is within range of an objective marker and no enemy units are within range of that objective marker, that objective marker is Secured by your army.

stratagems.name: PREDATORY POUNCE
stratagems.legend: The internal hatchways of prey voidships make excellent ambush sites for vanguard organisms.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit opens a Hatchway.TARGET: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that is within 3" of that Hatchway and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.EFFECT: Your unit can make a Pounce move. To do so, your unit can be moved up to 3", but must end that move as close as possible to that Hatchway. When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit, but only that enemy unit.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit opens a Hatchway.
stratagems.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that is within 3" of that Hatchway and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can make a Pounce move. To do so, your unit can be moved up to 3", but must end that move as close as possible to that Hatchway. When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit, but only that enemy unit.

abilities.name: Priority Predation
abilities.legend: As these cunning vanguard predators move deeper into the prey vessel, they adapt their hunting patterns at need. They run down those victims worthy of slaughter while leaving lesser enemies to flee into the dark even as the Tyranids move away in search of far worthier prey.
abilities.rawDescription: Each time an enemy unit within Engagement Range of one or more TYRANIDS units from your army is selected to Fall Back, after that enemy unit has made that Fall Back move, for each of those TYRANIDS units, if there are no other enemy units within Engagement Range of it, it can make a Normal move of up to 3".
abilities.formattedDescription: Each time an enemy unit within Engagement Range of one or more TYRANIDS units from your army is selected to Fall Back, after that enemy unit has made that Fall Back move, for each of those TYRANIDS units, if there are no other enemy units within Engagement Range of it, it can make a Normal move of up to 3".

stratagems.name: SWARM-GUIDED SALVOES
stratagems.legend: One cannot hide from a gestalt entity with a million eyes, even in the densest cover.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One TYRANIDS MONSTER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability, and until the end of the phase each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that model’s Ballistic Skill characteristic and any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One TYRANIDS MONSTER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability, and until the end of the phase each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that model’s Ballistic Skill characteristic and any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: RAMPAGING MONSTROSITIES
stratagems.legend: Tyranid monsters have reserves of energy that they unleash in waves of devastating fury.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase.TARGET: One TYRANIDS MONSTER unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One TYRANIDS MONSTER unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: SAVAGE ROAR
stratagems.legend: This monster is even more terrifying to behold than other bioforms of its kind.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One TYRANIDS MONSTER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test and, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack that targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. If that Battle-shock test was failed, subtract 1 from the Wound roll as well.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One TYRANIDS MONSTER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test and, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack that targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. If that Battle-shock test was failed, subtract 1 from the Wound roll as well.

stratagems.name: MASSIVE IMPACT
stratagems.legend: Employing their sheer bulk and vicious chitinous horns and spikes, the largest Tyranids crash headlong through the foe, often with devastating results.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Charge phase, just after a TYRANIDS MONSTER model from your army ends a Charge move.TARGET: That TYRANIDS MONSTER model.EFFECT: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your model and roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
stratagems.when: Your Charge phase, just after a TYRANIDS MONSTER model from your army ends a Charge move.
stratagems.target: That TYRANIDS MONSTER model.
stratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your model and roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

stratagems.name: CORROSIVE VISCERA
stratagems.legend: Highly acidic fluids spray from the creature’s wounds, lethal to those nearby.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after a TYRANIDS MONSTER model from your army with the Deadly Demise ability that cannot FLY is destroyed.TARGET: That TYRANIDS MONSTER model. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.EFFECT: Do not roll one D6 to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by your model’s Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after a TYRANIDS MONSTER model from your army with the Deadly Demise ability that cannot FLY is destroyed.
stratagems.target: That TYRANIDS MONSTER model. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effect: Do not roll one D6 to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by your model’s Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted.

stratagems.name: UNTRAMMELLED FEROCITY
stratagems.legend: Encircling and entrapping such physically powerful and fearless beasts is nigh on impossible.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One TYRANIDS MONSTER unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can move through models (excluding TITANIC models) and sections of terrain features that are 4" or less in height. When doing so: It can move within Engagement Range of enemy models, but cannot end that move within Engagement Range of them. It can also move through sections of terrain features that are more than 4" in height, but if it does, after its unit has moved, roll one D6: on a 1, your unit is Battle-shocked.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One TYRANIDS MONSTER unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can move through models (excluding TITANIC models) and sections of terrain features that are 4" or less in height. When doing so: It can move within Engagement Range of enemy models, but cannot end that move within Engagement Range of them. It can also move through sections of terrain features that are more than 4" in height, but if it does, after its unit has moved, roll one D6: on a 1, your unit is Battle-shocked.

abilities.name: Enraged Behemoths
abilities.legend: In their efforts to lay the monstrous beasts of a Crusher Stampede low, the prey only succeed in further enraging the rampaging monsters. The surviving beasts are driven to fight with greater fury the more of their number that fall.
abilities.rawDescription: Each time a TYRANIDS MONSTER model from your army makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll if that model’s unit is below its Starting Strength, and add 1 to the Wound roll as well if that model’s unit is Below Half-strength. In addition, while a TYRANIDS MONSTER unit from your army (excluding Battle-shocked units) is at its Starting Strength, add 2 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit.
abilities.formattedDescription: Each time a TYRANIDS MONSTER model from your army makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll if that model’s unit is below its Starting Strength, and add 1 to the Wound roll as well if that model’s unit is Below Half-strength. In addition, while a TYRANIDS MONSTER unit from your army (excluding Battle-shocked units) is at its Starting Strength, add 2 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit.

stratagems.name: HYPERADRENAL REFLEXES
stratagems.legend: Goaded by the biostimulants surging through their bodies, these warrior organisms evade their enemies'attacks with unbelievable swiftness.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One GREAT DEVOURER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One GREAT DEVOURER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

stratagems.name: HUNTING GROUNDS
stratagems.legend: Genestealers on the hunt are relentless, squirming through hatches before they have even half opened.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase, just after a GREAT DEVOURER unit from your army opens a Hatchway.TARGET: That GREAT DEVOURER unit.EFFECT: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 3", provided at least one of its models ends that move on the opposite side of that Hatchway from when your unit opened it.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, just after a GREAT DEVOURER unit from your army opens a Hatchway.
stratagems.target: That GREAT DEVOURER unit.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 3", provided at least one of its models ends that move on the opposite side of that Hatchway from when your unit opened it.

stratagems.name: PERVASIVE DREAD
stratagems.legend: With the death of their leader, the surviving prey feel an ominous sense of doom press down upon them, heightened by subtle psionic assault.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after the enemy WARLORD is destroyed (and is not returned to the battlefield) by a GREAT DEVOURER unit from your army.TARGET: That GREAT DEVOURER unit.EFFECT: In your opponent’s next Command phase, each enemy unit on the battlefield must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result. This Stratagem cannot cause a unit to take two Battle-shock tests in the same phase.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after the enemy WARLORD is destroyed (and is not returned to the battlefield) by a GREAT DEVOURER unit from your army.
stratagems.target: That GREAT DEVOURER unit.
stratagems.effect: In your opponent’s next Command phase, each enemy unit on the battlefield must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result. This Stratagem cannot cause a unit to take two Battle-shock tests in the same phase.

stratagems.name: OUTFLANK
stratagems.legend: Swarms of Genestealers crawl through vents and ducts as they seek to outflank their prey.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.TARGET: One GENESTEALERS or PURESTRAIN GENESTEALERS unit from your army that is wholly within an Entry Zone.EFFECT: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves. It will arrive back on the battlefield in the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase. When doing so, if it was within one of your Entry Zones when it was removed, it must be set up wholly within another one of your Entry Zones. If it was within one of your opponent’s Entry Zones when it was removed, it must be set up wholly within another one of your opponent’s Entry Zones instead. If this is not possible, your unit is destroyed.
stratagems.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One GENESTEALERS or PURESTRAIN GENESTEALERS unit from your army that is wholly within an Entry Zone.
stratagems.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves. It will arrive back on the battlefield in the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase. When doing so, if it was within one of your Entry Zones when it was removed, it must be set up wholly within another one of your Entry Zones. If it was within one of your opponent’s Entry Zones when it was removed, it must be set up wholly within another one of your opponent’s Entry Zones instead. If this is not possible, your unit is destroyed.

abilities.name: Half-Glimpsed Shadows
abilities.legend: Possessed of alien cunning and unnatural stealth, Genestealers are able to fade back into the shadows or crawl across ceilings or under deck-plates, the better to evade notice by their prey.
abilities.rawDescription: Each time a ranged attack targets a GREAT DEVOURER unit from your army, if the attacking model is not within 6" of that unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
abilities.formattedDescription: Each time a ranged attack targets a GREAT DEVOURER unit from your army, if the attacking model is not within 6" of that unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: RAPID REGENERATION
stratagems.legend: Prey stare in horror as chitinous armour regrows and flesh, muscle and sinew knots back together.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability. If your unit is within Synapse Range of your army, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability instead.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability. If your unit is within Synapse Range of your army, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability instead.

stratagems.name: ADRENAL SURGE
stratagems.legend: These warrior organisms destroy all as their adrenaline surges.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase.TARGET: Up to two TYRANIDS units from your army that are within Synapse Range of your army and are eligible to fight, or one other TYRANIDS unit from your army that is eligible to fight.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in any of those selected units makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: Up to two TYRANIDS units from your army that are within Synapse Range of your army and are eligible to fight, or one other TYRANIDS unit from your army that is eligible to fight.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in any of those selected units makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

stratagems.name: DEATH FRENZY
stratagems.legend: Tyranids care nothing for self-preservation, lashing out even in death.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.name: OVERRUN
stratagems.legend: Tyranids in battle form an unstoppable avalanche of flesh and chitin that buries the foe alive.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just before a TYRANIDS unit from your army Consolidates.TARGET: That TYRANIDS unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit Consolidates, models in it can move an additional 3" as long as your unit can end that move within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units. If your unit is within Synapse Range of your army and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, instead of making that Consolidation move, it can make a Normal move of up to 6".
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just before a TYRANIDS unit from your army Consolidates.
stratagems.target: That TYRANIDS unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit Consolidates, models in it can move an additional 3" as long as your unit can end that move within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units. If your unit is within Synapse Range of your army and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, instead of making that Consolidation move, it can make a Normal move of up to 6".

stratagems.name: PREDATORY IMPERATIVE
stratagems.legend: Guided by the instincts of leader-beasts, the swarm can be tasked with focusing its hunting instincts.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Command phase.TARGET: Up to two TYRANIDS units from your army that are within Synapse Range of your army, or one other TYRANIDS unit from your army.EFFECT: Select one Hyper-adaptation. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Hyper-adaptation is active for those selected units in addition to any other that may be active for your army.RESTRICTIONS: You cannot select the same Hyper-adaptation you selected at the start of the first battle round.
stratagems.when: Your Command phase.
stratagems.target: Up to two TYRANIDS units from your army that are within Synapse Range of your army, or one other TYRANIDS unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Select one Hyper-adaptation. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Hyper-adaptation is active for those selected units in addition to any other that may be active for your army.RESTRICTIONS: You cannot select the same Hyper-adaptation you selected at the start of the first battle round.

stratagems.name: ENDLESS SWARM
stratagems.legend: As the battle rages, more organisms pour in to bolster the swarms.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Command phase.TARGET: Up to two ENDLESS MULTITUDE units from your army that are within Synapse Range of your army, or one other ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army.EFFECT: You can return up to D3+3 destroyed models to each of the selected units.
stratagems.when: Your Command phase.
stratagems.target: Up to two ENDLESS MULTITUDE units from your army that are within Synapse Range of your army, or one other ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: You can return up to D3+3 destroyed models to each of the selected units.

abilities.name: Hyper-adaptations
abilities.legend: Every warrior organism in the Tyranid race is fashioned by the ineffable alien will of the Hive Mind. Their flesh and chitin is endlessly mutable, honed into whatever form will prove most lethal to the prey.
abilities.rawDescription: At the start of the first battle round, select one of the following Hyper-adaptations to be active for TYRANIDS units from your army until the end of the battle:Swarming InstinctsEach time a TYRANIDS model with this Hyper-adaptation makes an attack that targets an INFANTRY or SWARM unit, that attack has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.Hyper-aggressionEach time a TYRANIDS model with this Hyper-adaptation makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, that attack has the [LETHAL HITS] ability.Hive PredatorsEach time a TYRANIDS model with this Hyper-adaptation makes an attack that targets a CHARACTER unit, on a Critical Hit, that attack has the [PRECISION] ability.
abilities.formattedDescription: At the start of the first battle round, select one of the following Hyper-adaptations to be active for TYRANIDS units from your army until the end of the battle:Swarming InstinctsEach time a TYRANIDS model with this Hyper-adaptation makes an attack that targets an INFANTRY or SWARM unit, that attack has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.Hyper-aggressionEach time a TYRANIDS model with this Hyper-adaptation makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, that attack has the [LETHAL HITS] ability.Hive PredatorsEach time a TYRANIDS model with this Hyper-adaptation makes an attack that targets a CHARACTER unit, on a Critical Hit, that attack has the [PRECISION] ability.

stratagems.name: REINFORCED HIVE NODE
stratagems.legend: Psionic shielding crackles around these leader-beasts, helping to ensure their survival.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One SYNAPSE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One SYNAPSE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: SYNAPTIC CHANNELLING
stratagems.legend: Tyranids are one with the Hive Mind; individuality is a disadvantage that they surpass.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Command phase.TARGET: One SYNAPSE unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the turn, while a friendly TYRANIDS unit is within 9" of the selected unit, that unit is within Synapse Range of your army.
stratagems.when: Command phase.
stratagems.target: One SYNAPSE unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, while a friendly TYRANIDS unit is within 9" of the selected unit, that unit is within Synapse Range of your army.

stratagems.name: IRRESISTIBLE WILL
stratagems.legend: Whether paralysing its prey or forcing them to stumble out of cover with its force of will, or else puppeteering nearby warrior organisms, the leader-beast ensures the prey targets are struck down.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.TARGET: One SYNAPSE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase, and one enemy unit within 24" of and visible to the SYNAPSE unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly TYRANIDS model makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, if the attacking model’s unit is within 6" of your SYNAPSE unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One SYNAPSE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase, and one enemy unit within 24" of and visible to the SYNAPSE unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly TYRANIDS model makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, if the attacking model’s unit is within 6" of your SYNAPSE unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

stratagems.name: IMPERATIVE DOMINANCE
stratagems.legend: At need, the focused will of the Tyranid leader-beasts can goad warrior organisms to exhibit strategically beneficial behaviours at the instant they are needed most.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Command phase.TARGET: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that is within Synapse Range of your army.EFFECT: Select one Synaptic Imperative, even if you have already selected that imperative this battle. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Synaptic Imperative is active for your unit instead of any other Synaptic Imperative that is active for your army.
stratagems.when: Your Command phase.
stratagems.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that is within Synapse Range of your army.
stratagems.effect: Select one Synaptic Imperative, even if you have already selected that imperative this battle. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Synaptic Imperative is active for your unit instead of any other Synaptic Imperative that is active for your army.

stratagems.name: THE SMOTHERING SHADOW
stratagems.legend: In the heart of the swarms, the Shadow in the Warp can literally kill with its smothering power.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Any phase, just after an enemy unit fails a Battle-shock test.TARGET: One SYNAPSE unit from your army within 12" of that enemy unit.EFFECT: Roll six D6: for each 3+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
stratagems.when: Any phase, just after an enemy unit fails a Battle-shock test.
stratagems.target: One SYNAPSE unit from your army within 12" of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effect: Roll six D6: for each 3+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

stratagems.name: OVERRIDE INSTINCTS
stratagems.legend: The seemingly omniscient Hive Mind processes the sensory input of its swarms at an impossible rate, and compels its broods to react accordingly.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that is within Synapse Range of your army and made a Fall Back move this phase.EFFECT: Your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge this turn.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that is within Synapse Range of your army and made a Fall Back move this phase.
stratagems.effect: Your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge this turn.

abilities.name: Synaptic Imperatives
abilities.legend: The leader-beasts of these swarms act as conduits to the will of the Hive Mind. Irresistible imperatives lash out from them like whips that drive lesser bioforms to hurl themselves at the prey, to fight on through fatal wounds or to attack with redoubled savagery.
abilities.rawDescription: At the start of the battle round, you can select one of the Synaptic Imperatives shown below. Until the end of the battle round, that Synaptic Imperative is active for your army and while a TYRANIDS unit from your army is within Synapse Range of your army, it will benefit from it. Each Synaptic Imperative can only be selected once per battle.Synaptic Augmentation: While this unit is within Synapse Range of your army, models in this unit have a 5+ invulnerable save.Surging Vitality: While this unit is within Synapse Range of your army, add 1 to Advance and Charge rolls made for this unit.Goaded to Slaughter: While this unit is within Synapse Range of your army, each time a model in this unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.
abilities.formattedDescription: At the start of the battle round, you can select one of the Synaptic Imperatives shown below. Until the end of the battle round, that Synaptic Imperative is active for your army and while a TYRANIDS unit from your army is within Synapse Range of your army, it will benefit from it. Each Synaptic Imperative can only be selected once per battle.Synaptic Augmentation: While this unit is within Synapse Range of your army, models in this unit have a 5+ invulnerable save.Surging Vitality: While this unit is within Synapse Range of your army, add 1 to Advance and Charge rolls made for this unit.Goaded to Slaughter: While this unit is within Synapse Range of your army, each time a model in this unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: BIO-ACID SURGE
stratagems.legend: Triggered by synaptic imperative, these warrior organisms'weapon limbs secrete dripping gouts of virulent bio-acid.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase.TARGET: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that is within Synapse Range of your army and has not been selected to fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that is within Synapse Range of your army and has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

stratagems.name: HIVE SIGHT
stratagems.legend: It is whispered amongst the fearful prey species that if one Tyranid can see you, they all can...
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Charge phase.TARGET: One TYRANIDS SYNAPSE unit from your army and one friendly TYRANIDS unit that has not declared a charge this phase.EFFECT: Select one enemy unit that is visible to your SYNAPSE unit. Until the end of the phase, each time your other unit declares a charge, it can include that enemy unit as a target of that charge, even if it is not visible to it, and when doing so, add 1 to the Charge roll.
stratagems.when: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One TYRANIDS SYNAPSE unit from your army and one friendly TYRANIDS unit that has not declared a charge this phase.
stratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit that is visible to your SYNAPSE unit. Until the end of the phase, each time your other unit declares a charge, it can include that enemy unit as a target of that charge, even if it is not visible to it, and when doing so, add 1 to the Charge roll.

stratagems.name: EXPENDABLE BIOMASS
stratagems.legend: The Tyranids will expend the lives of their lesser organisms in droves provided it results in their prey’s defeat.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One TYRANID WARRIORS WITH RANGED BIO-WEAPONS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Select one enemy unit that is visible to your unit and within Engagement Range of one or more friendly ENDLESS MULTITUDE or RIPPER SWARMS units. Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to make ranged attacks against that enemy unit as if it was not within Engagement Range of those friendly units. When doing so, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and, after your unit has finished making its attacks, each of those friendly units that started the phase within Engagement Range of that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One TYRANID WARRIORS WITH RANGED BIO-WEAPONS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit that is visible to your unit and within Engagement Range of one or more friendly ENDLESS MULTITUDE or RIPPER SWARMS units. Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to make ranged attacks against that enemy unit as if it was not within Engagement Range of those friendly units. When doing so, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and, after your unit has finished making its attacks, each of those friendly units that started the phase within Engagement Range of that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

stratagems.name: PHAGIC SPORES
stratagems.legend: In death, these warrior organisms release billowing clouds of hideously corrosive spores that reduce nearby prey to bubbling organic slicks.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One TYRANID WARRIORS WITH MELEE BIO-WEAPONS or TYRANID WARRIORS WITH RANGED BIO-WEAPONS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed as a result of an attack, do not remove it from play; after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, roll one D6: on a 3-5, the closest enemy unit within 3" of and visible to your unit suffers 1 mortal wound; on a 6, the closest enemy unit within 3" of and visible to your unit suffers 2 mortal wounds. The destroyed model is then removed from play.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One TYRANID WARRIORS WITH MELEE BIO-WEAPONS or TYRANID WARRIORS WITH RANGED BIO-WEAPONS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed as a result of an attack, do not remove it from play; after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, roll one D6: on a 3-5, the closest enemy unit within 3" of and visible to your unit suffers 1 mortal wound; on a 6, the closest enemy unit within 3" of and visible to your unit suffers 2 mortal wounds. The destroyed model is then removed from play.

abilities.name: Xeno-Terror
abilities.legend: To be trapped within the hull of a voidship with swarming Tyranids, subjected to the focused horror of the Shadow in the Warp that wreathes them, is more than some can stand.
abilities.rawDescription: When you unleash the Shadow in the Warp, subtract 1 from the Battle-shock test each enemy unit on the battlefield must take as a result. For each enemy unit that fails one of those tests, that enemy unit cannot Fire Overwatch this turn.
abilities.formattedDescription: When you unleash the Shadow in the Warp, subtract 1 from the Battle-shock test each enemy unit on the battlefield must take as a result. For each enemy unit that fails one of those tests, that enemy unit cannot Fire Overwatch this turn.

stratagems.name: TEEMING MASSES
stratagems.legend: Skittering, darting and pouring over one another, the Tyranids make for hard and confusing targets.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: SWARMING MASSES
stratagems.legend: The sheer weight of Tyranid numbers begins to tell as they bury their victims in lashing, biting horror.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.TARGET: One ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability, and If your unit contains 15 or more models, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability, and If your unit contains 15 or more models, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

stratagems.name: BOUNDING ADVANCE
stratagems.legend: Synaptic impulses from the Hive Mind urge greater speed from the swarm’s warrior organisms.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

stratagems.name: SYNAPTIC GOADING
stratagems.legend: For a moment, a minuscule sliver of the Hive Mind’s ineffable will is focussed through these warrior organisms, driving them to pounce upon either valuable prey or else some vital strategic target.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Any phase, just before an ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army that is within Synapse Range of your army makes a Surge move.TARGET: That ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit.EFFECT: When making that Surge move, you can re-roll the D6 to determine how far your unit moves, and your unit can end that move as close as possible to the closest objective marker (instead of as close as possible to the closest enemy unit]. All other rules for making Surge moves still apply.
stratagems.when: Any phase, just before an ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army that is within Synapse Range of your army makes a Surge move.
stratagems.target: That ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit.
stratagems.effect: When making that Surge move, you can re-roll the D6 to determine how far your unit moves, and your unit can end that move as close as possible to the closest objective marker (instead of as close as possible to the closest enemy unit]. All other rules for making Surge moves still apply.

stratagems.name: PRESERVATION IMPERATIVE
stratagems.legend: Triggered by incoming projectile fire, a synaptic pulse spurs the danger-senses of lesser warrior organisms and causes them to scatter like a shoal evading predators. Only once the explosions have stopped and the dust cleared do the bioforms bunch up once again.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, your unit is treated as containing fewer than five models for the purpose of the [BLAST] ability.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is treated as containing fewer than five models for the purpose of the [BLAST] ability.

stratagems.name: UNENDING WAVES
stratagems.legend: No matter how many warrior organisms are slain, more are already surging forward over their corpses.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Any phase.TARGET: One ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.EFFECT: Add a new unit to your army identical to your destroyed unit, in Strategic Reserves, at its Starting Strength.RESTRICTIONS: Any destroyed CHARACTER units that were attached to your unit are not returned. You can only use this Stratagem once per battle.
stratagems.when: Any phase.
stratagems.target: One ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effect: Add a new unit to your army identical to your destroyed unit, in Strategic Reserves, at its Starting Strength.RESTRICTIONS: Any destroyed CHARACTER units that were attached to your unit are not returned. You can only use this Stratagem once per battle.

abilities.name: Insurmountable Odds
abilities.legend: When Hormagaunts, Termagants and other such expendable warrior organisms attack en masse they make up for their comparative fragility with sheer numbers. Coupled with the speed and ferocity of their onslaught - which only seems to increase as the prey try to gun the creatures down or drive them back - the gathered broods soon overrun even the most determined defenders.
abilities.rawDescription: Each time an enemy unit is selected to shoot, after that unit has finished making its attacks, if one or more models from one or more ENDLESS MULTITUDE units from your army were destroyed as a result of those attacks, each such unit can make a Surge move. To do so, roll one D6: that unit can be moved a distance in inches up to the result, but that unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT). When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of enemy units. A unit cannot make a Surge move while it is Battle-shocked.
abilities.formattedDescription: Each time an enemy unit is selected to shoot, after that unit has finished making its attacks, if one or more models from one or more ENDLESS MULTITUDE units from your army were destroyed as a result of those attacks, each such unit can make a Surge move. To do so, roll one D6: that unit can be moved a distance in inches up to the result, but that unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT). When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of enemy units. A unit cannot make a Surge move while it is Battle-shocked.

stratagems.name: ASSASSIN BEASTS
stratagems.legend: These bioforms have been adapted to strike with pinpoint precision at the pre-assessed weak points of selected prey that require elimination.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase.TARGET: One VANGUARD INVADER INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PRECISION] ability.
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One VANGUARD INVADER INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PRECISION] ability.

stratagems.name: SURPRISE ASSAULT
stratagems.legend: Vanguard organisms strike from unexpected quarters with calculated and emotionless alien savagery that is appalling to behold.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after a VANGUARD INVADER unit from your army has selected its targets.TARGET: That VANGUARD INVADER unit.EFFECT: Select one enemy unit that was selected as the target of one or more of your unit’s attacks. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, add 1 to the Hit roll. If the Battle-shock test was failed, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after a VANGUARD INVADER unit from your army has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: That VANGUARD INVADER unit.
stratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit that was selected as the target of one or more of your unit’s attacks. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, add 1 to the Hit roll. If the Battle-shock test was failed, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

stratagems.name: SEEDED BROODS
stratagems.legend: Warrior organisms erupt from concealment straight into advanced positions.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that is in Reserves, or up to two VANGUARD INVADER units from your army that are in Reserves.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, for the purposes of setting up those selected units on the battlefield, treat the current battle round number as being one higher than it actually is.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that is in Reserves, or up to two VANGUARD INVADER units from your army that are in Reserves.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, for the purposes of setting up those selected units on the battlefield, treat the current battle round number as being one higher than it actually is.

stratagems.name: HYPERSENSORY SCILLIA
stratagems.legend: Hissing clusters of scillia warn of the slightest prey movements, allowing the Tyranids to react.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.TARGET: Up to two VANGUARD INVADER units from your army that are within 9" of that enemy unit, or one other TYRANIDS INFANTRY unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.EFFECT: Those selected units can each make a Normal move of up to 6".RESTRICTIONS: You cannot target units that are within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.target: Up to two VANGUARD INVADER units from your army that are within 9" of that enemy unit, or one other TYRANIDS INFANTRY unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effect: Those selected units can each make a Normal move of up to 6".RESTRICTIONS: You cannot target units that are within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

stratagems.name: UNSEEN LURKERS
stratagems.legend: Hyper-attuned senses warn vanguard organisms when they are being targeted by the prey.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One VANGUARD INVADER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, your unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18" or, if your unit has the Lone Operative ability, if the attacking model is within 6". Your opponent can select new targets for the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One VANGUARD INVADER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18" or, if your unit has the Lone Operative ability, if the attacking model is within 6". Your opponent can select new targets for the attacking unit’s attacks.

stratagems.name: INVISIBLE HUNTER
stratagems.legend: Hunter-slayer organisms can melt away before the eyes of their foes, only to strike from a new direction.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.TARGET: Up to two VANGUARD INVADER units from your army, or one TYRANIDS INFANTRY unit from your army.EFFECT: Remove the targeted units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.RESTRICTIONS: The targeted units must be more than 3" away from all enemy units.
stratagems.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
stratagems.target: Up to two VANGUARD INVADER units from your army, or one TYRANIDS INFANTRY unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Remove the targeted units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.RESTRICTIONS: The targeted units must be more than 3" away from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Questing Tendrils
abilities.legend: In the early stages of an invasion, the Hive Mind harries and unbalances its foes with lightning-fast flanking attacks, before encircling them for the final, bloody slaughter.
abilities.rawDescription: TYRANIDS units with this ability are eligible to charge in a turn in which they Fell Back. VANGUARD INVADER units with this ability are eligible to charge in a turn in which they Advanced.
abilities.formattedDescription: TYRANIDS units with this ability are eligible to charge in a turn in which they Fell Back. VANGUARD INVADER units with this ability are eligible to charge in a turn in which they Advanced.

stratagems.name: PARASITIC PAYLOAD
stratagems.type: Warrior Bioform Onslaught – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The projectiles fired by this weapon are infected with parasites that burrow into the central nervous systems of their targets, causing them to wail and scream in pain and giving away their position to the oncoming swarms.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One TYRANID WARRIORS WITH RANGED BIO-WEAPONS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability. After your unit has resolved its shooting attacks this phase, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the turn, models in that unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One TYRANID WARRIORS WITH RANGED BIO-WEAPONS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability. After your unit has resolved its shooting attacks this phase, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the turn, models in that unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover.

stratagems.name: SYNAPTIC MICRONODES
stratagems.type: Warrior Bioform Onslaught – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Impulses from the Hive Mind compel its most adaptable bioforms to shed microbial micronodes that burrow into the soil, knitting together to form a short-term synaptic relay that persists only as long as the brief-burning lifespans of its composite creatures.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One TYRANID WARRIORS unit from your army.EFFECT: Select one objective marker you control that your unit is within range of. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One TYRANID WARRIORS unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Select one objective marker you control that your unit is within range of. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

stratagems.name: RESTORATIVE IMPULSE
stratagems.type: Warrior Bioform Onslaught – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Responding to impulses from the Hive Mind, dormant nanoviral organisms awaken within the corpse of a fallen Tyranid Warrior, knitting together ruptured organs and restoring its broken form to life.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Command phase.TARGET: One TYRANID WARRIORS unit from your army that is below its Starting Strength.EFFECT: Return 1 destroyed model (excluding CHARACTER models) to your unit.
stratagems.when: Your Command phase.
stratagems.target: One TYRANID WARRIORS unit from your army that is below its Starting Strength.
stratagems.effect: Return 1 destroyed model (excluding CHARACTER models) to your unit.

stratagems.name: SYNAPTIC AMPLIFICATION
stratagems.type: Warrior Bioform Onslaught – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Tyranid Warriors focus and amplify the urgency of the Hive Mind’s impulse to nearby broods, lending them increased coordination.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.TARGET: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.EFFECT: If that unit is a TYRANID WARRIORS unit, select up to one ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army, that is not Battle-shocked, within 6" of it. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in those units makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1, and, if it is a TYRANID WARRIORS unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 as well.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: If that unit is a TYRANID WARRIORS unit, select up to one ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army, that is not Battle-shocked, within 6" of it. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in those units makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1, and, if it is a TYRANID WARRIORS unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 as well.

stratagems.name: SYNAPTIC SHIELD
stratagems.type: Warrior Bioform Onslaught – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: By focusing the psionic energies of the Hive Mind, these leader‑beasts shield the teeming bioforms under their command.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One TYRANID WARRIORS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: If that unit is a TYRANID WARRIORS unit, select up to one ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army, that is not Battle-shocked, within 6" of it. Until the end of the phase, each time a ranged attack targets one of those units, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of that unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
